Name: D & L Art Glass Supply
Description / Notes: Thank you! We have received your application for a wholesale account. Upon review (which we do Monday thru Friday) we will get back to you with our decision. In the meantime, see the complete catalog of all D&L has to offer. Know that pricing shown is Retail price. If approved, you will see your wholesale prices once you log in. For now, have fun planning your order!
